【Enjoy Funny Games Anytime, Anywhere】: Convenient protable size and Lightweight, it is perfect for playing travel or on the go. It can also play on your big TV screen after your connect it to TV with the included AV cable.

【Entertain Your Kids and Keep Them Busy】 : English language,simple arcade style,easy to play.It is a perfect partner to keep your kids occupied and have a good time of games playing .You can also enjoy fun games with your sweetheart and it would be so much fun for the whole family.
【Surprise Birthday Gift For Children】 : it is a surprise birthday/Christmas present for your kids and anybody who love the old school games.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A variety of colors to choose from Boys can choose blue and girls can choose red. Those who prefer neutral colors can also choose black or green. Why QS4 Retro Handheld Game Console is Your Best Choice? This is one that allows your child to experience the classic games of the 80s and 90s. Kids deserve to experience the joy of our childhood too!This is a best-selling high-quality game console: it adopts color LCD screen, supports TV output and runs smoothly. HD picture feeling, smooth gaming experience, rich classic games, your kids will love it. Built-in 182 Classic Games 2.5-Inch Colorful LCD Screen Support TV Output Adjustable Volume No Need WiFi Use AAA batteries，No need charge

Built-in classic games of many different genres 182 classic games including: Arcade retro games, Logic & math, Sports, Puzzle, Arcade, Action, Racing, Fighting games, Strategy, Adventure, Card games and more to meet your demand to play varieties of games what you like.

The Best Christmas Gifts for Kids in 2023 Elegant and stylish design, it is a GREAT gift on special days, such as birthdays, Christmas and other holidays.It is a surprise present for your kids and anybody who love the old school games. English language,simple arcade style,easy to play.It is a perfect partner to keep your kids occupied and have a good time of games playing .You can also enjoy fun games with your sweetheart and it would be so much fun for the whole family.

Keep your kids entertained anytime, anywhere Your kids can play the game console itself or connect it to the TV screen. It is a perfect partner no matter indoor or outdoor: in line, on Long-distance car travel or flying journey or at home. With this video game player, your child will not be bored again even if he stays at home for a long time.

Don't hesitate to give your child the gift of happiness, starting NOW! It is a surprise gift for classic video game enthusiasts age 4-12. The best time of using it as a gift is holiday such as Birthday, Christmas, Thanksgiving, New Year etc. What’s in The Box ? 1 x QS4 Game Console1 x User manual1 x AV Cable

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, kids love it!
reviews.reviewText: Kids love these games, it has way too many options for games but that's not necessarily a negative. Kids play them for hours!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works fine playing games but the headphones jack doesn’t work. Haven’t tried hooking to the TV yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great handheld games!
reviews.reviewText: My 5 year old and spouse were both excited to play the games on this! It contains over 100 games, many of which were older games and former Atari games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Features different versions of the same game!
reviews.reviewText: What I hate most about this game is that you have to hit the reset button in order to replay the same game. If I'm playing Tetris and lose the game, I have to hit the reset button which takes you to the game control's intro, find the game again if I want to replay. What bothers me the most about this game is that it contains multiple versions of the same game! Even though it mentions more than 160 games, does this really matter if there are 10 variations of Pacman, 10, variations of Donkey Kong, 10 versions of Mario brothers, etc.? And games that aren't exactly one of these games are then weak 'variations' of these games, just with another name. When I reached out to the manufacturers, they blew me off. I will look to find a better game.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: It looks like it is from five below. It is so cheap. I had to return it. It honestly looks like it could be from the dollar store.
